c6-22.text: Because she is so tightly bound and unable to sustain posture, these men will be handling our subject slut during sessions like a slab of meat, arranging her into the various positions and the slutty poses most suitable for viewing her body parts and arousal responses. c6-23.text: Alright people, divide into groups of six. Move from your seats there and come to the stage. The academicship clamored in a rush. Slowly now, people. Only six at the table at a time! c6-24.text: The first period of the first session of the first day was just starting. The man stopped before leaving the stage, and whispered in Annie's ear. You've done well here so far, slut. c6-25.text: Annie closed her eyes and took a deep breath.
